Craigendarroch Timeshare
The Timesharing scheme is a new development of luxury chalets with a choice of swapping your bought holiday week with one abroad. A television and press advertising campaign has started in Scotland, and nationwide but not yet abroad. It is thought that a lot of weeks will be sold to Americans who are fond of holidays in this area. There will be twenty-two lodges by October and eighty-five eventually. Timeshare owners will be able to use the Country Club facilities. Doubts have been expressed by some local people about the scarring of the landscape and so on by this major building plan.
